messages.title: My Pledges to You
messages.content: Campaign for more jobs locally for young people. Insist that new housing estates have proper services like roads, schools, shops and health centres. Continue to protect our green spaces. Work for a hospital and medical school in Gwent. I will be a strong local voice raising your concerns about housing developments on green field sites, local health services and community facilities like libraries, swimming pools and leisure centres.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Creating Jobs and Supporting Young People
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign for more jobs locally for young people.
Insist that new housing estates have proper services like roads, schools, shops and health centres.
Continue to protect our green spaces.
Work for a hospital and medical school in Gwent.

I will be a strong local voice raising your concerns about housing developments on green field sites, local health services and community facilities like libraries, swimming pools and leisure centres.

mentions.candidate: Lindsay Whittle has a proven track record of public service.

issues.environment: Continue to protect our green spaces.
issues.health: Work for a hospital and medical school in Gwent.

housing.content: I will be a strong local voice raising your concerns about housing developments on green field sites, local health services and community facilities like libraries, swimming pools and leisure centres.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been proud to represent the people of Caerphilly for over 40 years, as a community councillor, county borough councillor and as your Assembly Member. Now I'm asking for your support to represent Caerphilly in the Senedd.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaign for a metro for the Valleys. Secure funding for a new Welsh-medium school in Caerphilly. Stop a waste dump.

quotes.text: Lindsay Whittle has shown time and again that he is a community champion. He has been a tireless campaigner over many decades, and always puts Caerphilly first. His track record speaks for itself.

images.caption: Lindsay Whittle together with Leanne Wood, standing in front of a building.
Infographic outlines key policies and pledges.
Lindsay Whittle interacting with community members.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet primarily focuses on local service improvement such as jobs for young people, protection of green spaces, a hospital and medical school in Gwent, and addressing housing development concerns.
